channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Corporation -- The installers of multiple Sony products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sony Corporation -- The installers of multiple Sony products

item.title: CVE-2021-20793|2024-08-03T17:53:22.532Z -- sony%20corporation -- the%20installers%20of%20multiple%20sony%20products
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Sony Audio USB Driver V1.10 and prior and the installer of HAP Music Transfer Ver.1.3.0 and prior allows an attacker to gain privileges and execute arbitrary code via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
